db:abstract.db:para: The QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension class allows you to manipulate a widget's dynamic properties in Qt Designer's property editor.
This class was introduced in Qt 4.3.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension::~QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the dynamic property sheet extension.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension::addDynamicProperty(const QString &propertyName, const QVariant &value)
db:section.db:para: Adds a dynamic property named propertyName and sets its value to value. Returns the index of the property if it was added successfully; otherwise returns -1 to indicate failure.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension::canAddDynamicProperty(const QString &propertyName) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if propertyName is a valid, unique name for a dynamic property; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension::dynamicPropertiesAllowed() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the widget supports dynamic properties; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension::isDynamicProperty(int index) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the property at the given index is a dynamic property; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QDesignerDynamicPropertySheetExtension::removeDynamicProperty(int index)
db:section.db:para: Removes the dynamic property at the given index. Returns true if the operation succeeds; otherwise returns false.
